nodes.text: Darrastead was a village with about 100 inhabitants on Onderon. It was led by elders. The villagers were often used as laborers by the Imperials from Whisper Base.

Darrastead appears in Operation: Shadowpoint, a 2014 adventure in Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: Age of Rebellion gameline. It is a possible location as part of the adventure, with the villagers helping the players.
